text: @GOPLeader Dismissing concerns that states are reopening too soon,  Trump incorrectly said a newly revised model projecting 134,000 COVID-19 deaths by August “assumes no mitigation.” In fact, the model assumes states will keep their existing social distancing measures in place. FactCheck
